wordGroup: level of modernization 现代化水平

sentences.en: All attempts at modernization were stamped on by senior officials.
sentences.cn: 旨在实现现代化的努力统统受到高级官员的压制。

sentences.en: Successful agricultural reform is also a sine qua non of Mexico's modernization.
sentences.cn: 成功的农业改革也是墨西哥实现现代化的必要条件。

sentences.en: Modernization will bring a number of benefits to Chinese people.
sentences.cn: 现代化将给中国人民带来许多好处。
